trans-unit.source: Specifies UDP retransmission settings.
trans-unit.target: 指定 UDP 传输设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings"></xref> class with specified maximum unicast retransmit count and maximum multicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings"></xref>类指定的最大单播重新传输多播的最大重新传输计数和计数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum unicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 最大单播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum multicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 最大多播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings"></xref> class with specified maximum unicast retransmit count and maximum multicast retransmit count, delay lower bound, delay upper bound, and maximum delay per retransmission.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings"></xref>类指定的最大单播重新传输计数和最大的多路广播重新传输计数、 延迟下限、 延迟上限和每次重新传输的最大延迟。

trans-unit.source: The maximum unicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 最大单播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum multicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 最大多播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: The lower bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 界限低于延迟时间。

trans-unit.source: The upper bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 延迟上限。

trans-unit.source: The maximum delay per retransmission.
trans-unit.target: 每次重新传输最大延迟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delay of the lower bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的下限的延迟时间重新传输设置。

trans-unit.source: The delay of the lower bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 重新传输设置下限的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delay of the upper bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的重新传输设置上限的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The delay of the upper bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 重新传输设置上限的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum delay per retransmission for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每次重新传输设置的重新传输的最大延迟。

trans-unit.source: The maximum delay per retransmission for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 每次重新传输设置的重新传输最大延迟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum multicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大的多路广播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum multicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 最大的多路广播重新传输计数中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum unicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大单播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum unicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 最大单播重新传输计数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the lower bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 指示 UDP 传输设置是否应序列化的下限延迟。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the lower bound delay; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果 UDP 传输设置应序列化的下限延迟;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the upper bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 指示 UDP 传输设置是否应序列化的上限延迟。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the upper bound delay; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果 UDP 传输设置应序列化的上限延迟;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the maximum delay per retransmission.
trans-unit.target: 指示 UDP 传输设置是否应序列化每次重新传输的最大延迟。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the maximum delay per retransmission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果 UDP 传输设置应序列化每次重新传输; 的最大延迟否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
